page.title: 20HISTORY
page.content: The Great house in Aberthin was built by William Thomas. Most of the house dates from early 17th.century. Since then,very little of this beautiful house has been altered. There is a large garden and a gatehouse which is approached by a bridge over a small stream in Aberthin.The main characteristic is the symmetrical front elevation of the house. During the early 14th.century a battle is said to have taken place on Stalling Down. Owain Glyndwr claimed to be descended from the rulers of Powys. He gathered Welsh forces and carried out a guerilla type war against the authority of King Henry IV. The Battle of Llanquian took place on Stalling Down. Unfortunately no evidence of this battle exists.
